title: DataVec: Add NHWC support for ImageRecordReader / NativeImageLoader
author: blackhu

comments.body: At the moment, this is hard coded, but we can use NDArray.permute() on the arrays returned by NativeImageLoader as a post-processing step.

> At the moment, this is hard coded, but we can use NDArray.reshape() on the arrays returned by NativeImageLoader as a post-processing step.

But reshape cannot reshape result is (height,weight,channel)

You want permute, not reshape.

```
INDArray nhwc = imgNchw.permute(0,2,3,1);
```
